place.name: WANLIP
place.gazetteerText: WANLIP--originally Onelip--a parish in Barrow- upon-Soar district, Leicester; on the river Soar, 1½ mile W of Syston r. station. Post town, Leicester. Acres, 952. Real property, £2,157. Pop., 117. Houses, 25. The manor belongs to Sir G. J. Palmer, Bart. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Peterborough. Value, £336.* Patron, Sir G. J. Palmer, Bart. The church is good; and there is a national school. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
